Navigation Bar

The primary navigation components for Sport Wales. These components handle global navigation, search functionality, and user portal access.

1. Standard Global Nav

The default navigation bar used across the public site. It features the logo, main navigation links, search, profile access, and language toggle.

About us Grants & Funding Guidance & Support Facilities News & Events
Switch to Welsh

2. Search Focused Nav

An expanded version of the standard nav that reveals a prominent search bar. Used for search results pages or when the user initiates a search.

About us Grants & Funding Guidance & Support Facilities News & Events
Switch to Welsh

3. Portal Login Nav

A variation used for portals and facility sites. It uses the secondary brand red and features a prominent call-to-action login button.

Home Our Facilities Programs About Us Contact
